title: How to Draw a Happy Witch and 99 Things That Go Bump in the Night
description: Bigger, better, and Joy Sikorski and Nick Sunday have a new and improved format for their fun follow-up to How to Draw a Sailing Cat .Young readers will embark on an imaginative (and not too spooky) Halloween adventure with Little Man, a bold and curious cat, as he slips through the woods to a wonderful party for costumed trick-or-treaters. Lively pastel-and-pencil illustrations demonstrate how to draw more than 100 things encountered on the journey.well as in trade bookstores.
author: Joy Sikorski
